name: Samurai Shodown
overview: After nearly ten years out of the spotlight, SAMURAI SHODOWN is back with a vengeance! Developed by the team behind the critically acclaimed KING OF FIGHTERS XIV, thirteen beloved fighters return, along with three new, to do battle on this legendary stage! LEGACY: The same tense, high-damage single strike battles that the series is known for! EVOLUTION: New, cinematic art style and updated fight mechanics bring each battle to life in a variety of online and offline modes. REVOLUTION: Take on the top players in the world through a revolutionary AI system that learns player patterns and creates “Ghost” clones for you to take on in head-to-head battles.
